body: Today while i was on Neb/Dtm and something was blocking the area. we were losing because of this. i think it is a moderator/map dev on invis trolling please help. also look at this: http://imgur.com/xWc0pS2. this could even be the work  of a hacker/cheater but i dont know. well Bye!

title: A mod is a troll.

replies.body: Well, once we figure out what the picture is of, we can deal with it.

replies.body:
If you believe that a mod is abusing their power you should email us.

What your seeing here is just a 1.8 bug. You can fix this buy re-logging.

This can happen to anyone. not just mods.
replies.body_tagged:
If you believe that a mod is abusing their power you should email us.

What your seeing here is just a 1.8 bug. You can fix this buy re-logging.

replies.body: The picture shows white death messages btw. And as Draksis said, it's a 1.8 bug. No mods are trolling xD

replies.body: Thou made this sound worse than it is its a glitch and sometimes you dont know you are invisable !
